main.title: Seamless, inspiring and meaningful
main.description:
Ink an important contract or seal the deal in an environment that does the job right.

Nowadays, meetings are not limited to stiff suit-and-tie venues. Beyond the four walls of a boardroom is a whole world of inspiration, from floor to ceiling glass windows on the 42nd floor, down to a quaint country home by the countryside – we have an extensive portfolio of meeting spaces for a productive and memorable exchange of ideas.

venues.title: Discovery Suites Ortigas
venues.description:
It’s all about the execution. Our team of professionals will look after all the fine details while the client need only mind their corporate agenda. For a successful event, all rooms are fully-equipped with state-of-the-art facilities, including High Speed Internet Access for unlimited devices. Sweeping views of the city skyline give the average business meeting an extraordinary touch.

A maximum of 120 guests can be accommodated on a theater setup.

venues.title: Discovery Primea Makati
venues.description:
Located in the heart of Makati, guests can focus on the business at hand with a dedicated concierge and IT butlers who will cater to their every whim. The rooms feature premium amenities, including boardroom tables with media panels and complimentary Wi-Fi, meant for a conducive working environment. The exclusive number of meeting venues assures personalized and bespoke attention for every group.

A maximum of 210 guests can be accommodated on a theater setup.

MAKE AN INQUIRYVISIT THE WEBSITE

venues.title: Discovery Shores Boracay
venues.description:
Discerning planners can pull off a definitive power meeting in Boracay, the perfect setting for work and play. Comfortable venues, delightful cuisine and unobtrusive yet dependable service make for a productive conference. Meetings at the shores have never been this remarkable.

A maximum of 60 guests can be accommodated on a theater setup. Outdoor functions may be arranged.

venues.title: Club Paradise Palawan
venues.description:
Club Paradise offers a peaceful location for business, designed to enhance the meeting process. With its inspiring setting, excellent facilities and heartfelt service, the island is a powerful tool to make work feel as relaxing as possible. The meeting rooms can be divided into two flexible spaces, ideal for every kind of corporate affair.

A maximum of 60 guests can be accommodated on a theater setup. Outdoor functions may be arranged.

Nowadays, meetings are not limited to stiff suit-and-tie venues. Beyond the four walls of a boardroom is a whole world of inspiration, from floor to ceiling glass windows on the 42nd floor, down to a quaint country home by the countryside – we have an extensive portfolio of meeting spaces for a productive and memorable exchange of ideas.

main.title: Exquisitely chic
main.description: Contemporary yet classic, simple yet sophisticated. Getting wed in the city is a fabulous way to bring family and friends together. Impeccable service, gorgeous flower arrangements and dazzling skylines put the cherry on top of the fantastic wedding fete you’ve always dreamed of.

venues.title: Discovery Primea Makati
venues.description: Go for an ultra-luxe celebration in the heart of the Makati district for a sensational milestone to remember. The newly-opened Discovery Primea offers highly personalized service, exquisite design, modern facilities and gastronomic specialties for discerning couples.

venues.title: Discovery Suites Ortigas
venues.description: Revel at the panoramic view of the metro, right at the center of the Ortigas Business District. More than the breathtaking views, our creative banquets team can make things happen on the most important day of your life, just the way you want it.

attributes.value: Contemporary yet classic, simple yet sophisticated. Getting wed in the city is a fabulous way to bring family and friends together. Impeccable service, gorgeous flower arrangements and dazzling skylines put the cherry on top of the fantastic wedding fete you’ve always dreamed of.

Go for an ultra-luxe celebration in the heart of the Makati district for a sensational milestone to remember. The newly-opened Discovery Primea offers highly personalized service, exquisite design, modern facilities and gastronomic specialties for discerning couples.

main.title: A sun-kissed “I Do”
main.description: Beach weddings are meant to be easy breezy, a fun and relaxing celebration for the couple and their guests. From the world-famous white sand of Boracay to the astonishing sunsets of Palawan, booking your ideal wedding has never been more romantic.

venues.title: Discovery Shores Boracay
venues.description: Celebrate in style at Discovery Shores Boracay. We make your dream wedding come true with Boracay’s renowned beachfront glamor while having every modern convenience and luxury within reach. Simply treasure happy moments while a relentlessly passionate team of event managers will take care of the rest.

venues.title: Club Paradise Palawan
venues.description: Tie the knot in a secluded island all to your own, as Coron’s cerulean waters and pristine white sand make for a picture-perfect backdrop. Couples looking for exclusivity and intimacy will love the hidden beaches and precious spots around the island, made more special by a team who is genuinely delighted to arrange the most important day of your life.

attributes.value: Beach weddings are meant to be easy breezy, a fun and relaxing celebration for the couple and their guests. From the world-famous white sand of Boracay to the astonishing sunsets of Palawan, booking your ideal wedding has never been more romantic.

Celebrate in style at Discovery Shores Boracay. We make your dream wedding come true with Boracay’s renowned beachfront glamor while having every modern convenience and luxury within reach. Simply treasure happy moments while a relentlessly passionate team of event managers will take care of the rest.

main.title: Reliably spectacular
main.description: Dream it, and we’ll make it happen: social gatherings are our specialty. Let your imagination run free while we do the essentials. We bring diversity and energy to all our catering and offer everything from lavish banquets, live cooking stations and intimate cocktails.

venues.title: Discovery Primea Makati
venues.description:
From deluxe staycations, close-knit get-togethers to grand events, Discovery Primea can cater for all occasions. The expert culinary team aims to delight with bespoke menus, immaculately presented dishes and mouth-watering cuisine. The venue’s elegant design coupled with modernized facilities make for a marvelous fete.

MAKE AN INQUIRYVISIT THE WEBSITE

venues.title: Discovery Suites Ortigas
venues.description: Ready for any request, our highly trained team of event specialists will do what it takes to make your event a success. Enjoy skyline views of the pulsating city while you toast to a memorable bash. Our roster of master chefs plan each event individually, matching themes or tastes accordingly.

venues.title: Discovery Shores Boracay
venues.description: Toast under the warm glow of the sun or dance beneath the stars, with Boracay’s famous powdery white sand as your dancefloor. Bringing an exciting gourmet edge to your event, our talented culinary team are experts when it comes to creative menus inspired by coastal cuisine.

venues.title: Club Paradise Palawan
venues.description: On your next event, immerse yourself in Club Paradise’s natural location and its enchanting abundance of flora and fauna. Enjoy the exclusivity of an island all to your own, with hidden beaches, secret picnic spots and isolated neighboring islands. The bounties of the sea is only a fresh catch away.

attributes.value: Dream it, and we’ll make it happen: social gatherings are our specialty. Let your imagination run free while we do the essentials. We bring diversity and energy to all our catering and offer everything from lavish banquets, live cooking stations and intimate cocktails.

main.description:
Allow us to expand your safe spaces and invite you into our own. From simple meet-ups, intimate gatherings to corporate events, discover familiar, longed-for-moments in the spaces we’ve made safe for you.

Safe Space, a trailblazing initiative re-imagining meeting, event and celebration spaces and making them safe in the time of the global pandemic.

Backed by the Home Safe program we’ve implemented at all our destinations and partnership with Lysol, Safe Space combines Discovery’s signature brand of hospitality and commitment to guests’ safety.

venues.title: Meetups & Co-Working Spaces
venues.description:
Interview for an hour or the whole day. Meet professional partners: architects, educators, doctors, stylists within safe spaces inside Discovery Suites Ortigas and Discovery Primea Makati. Close deals in the city’s premium addresses. Select desired service through the Safe Space booking platform: book preferred schedule, pay online, and relish in luxurious spaces sanitized on a per-use basis.

Re-imagine co-working spaces. Safe Space co-working program is the face-to-face solution to your WFH woes. When personal meet-up, from time to time, can not be avoided, choose the premium address for your meetup office.

Avail of full year packages that allow you to have your premium address in the city without steep rental rates. Enjoy concierge services and other amenities within your luxurious spaces.

For more relaxed options, book as needed and avail of minimum hours of co-working space use.

Meeting spaces are sanitized and disinfected after each use with Lysol products following our Home Safe protocols ensuring best practices in safety, service and care.

How it works:

  1. Select your desired service through the Safe Space booking platform.
  2. Book your preferred schedule.
  3. Settle your payment online.
  4. Arrive at your chosen date and time and relish in luxurious spaces sanitized on a per-use basis.
  5. Create your own co-working space account. Contact safespace@discoveryhospitality.com to request for your customized co-working space plan and your appointment calendar.

venues.title: Space Rentals
venues.description:
Once the government permits social gathering, Safe Space will likewise allow guests to enjoy essential moments in their safe space of choice (home, office or Discovery property) and focus more on what’s at hand. Birthdays, weddings, staff meetings, corporate events, our essential team will ensure a safe and responsible gathering based on guidelines set by no less than the Department of Tourism and disinfected by Lysol wherever your safe space may be.

Can’t host in-house? DHC offers Space Rentals, taking care of the health and sanitation requirements, design, and other key elements with the client’s or its in-house event planners. Intimate get-togethers crafted with the utmost attention to detail, none too small.

How it works?

  1. Contact the banquet offices of Discovery hotels & resorts to inquire about space rental.
  2. The banquet offices of Discovery hotels and resorts will coordinate your inquiry for a space rental.
  3. Settle your payment directly with the hotel or resort.

attributes.value:
Allow us to expand your safe spaces and invite you into our own. From simple meet-ups, intimate gatherings to corporate events, discover familiar, longed-for-moments in the spaces we’ve made safe for you.

Safe Space, a trailblazing initiative re-imagining meeting, event and celebration spaces and making them safe in the time of the global pandemic.

Backed by the Home Safe program we’ve implemented at all our destinations and partnership with Lysol, Safe Space combines Discovery’s signature brand of hospitality and commitment to guests’ safety.
